author: tocheng
body:
Hello, the PR is meant to monitor the PCL payloads of SiPixelQuality using tracker offline DQM.
The harvester is changed to a DQMEDAnalyzer to produce the payloads and DQM IO in one CMSSW module. The payloads are not affected.

More info and validation will be presented in pixel offline meeting on June 19th:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/688867/?showDate=all&showSession=11
title: Monitoring of SiPixelQuality PCL using tracker offline DQM and bugfix for the SiPixelQuality tag for PromptReco
